item.description: Md. Zarif Ul Alam CS Undergrad , BUET

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi , my name is Md. Zarif Ul Alam. I am from Dhaka , Bangladesh . Besides pursuing my higher studies from Department of Computer Science and Engineering , BUET , I like to do competitive programming and my interests include Machine Learning and Cryptography . I like to work on small pet projects of my own whenever I have some idea . Besides that , I like to read books and enjoy traveling .

item.title: Projects
item.description: GAME OF PAWNS CHESS GAME A chess game with multiplayer , single player ( dummy AI :p ) and blitz mode . This game is made using C++ and iGraphics library . </> c++ iGraphics GitHub Repo DURBEEN : THE DAWN OF PROGRAMMING LEARNING TOOL FOR PROGRAMMING IN BANGLA FOR KIDS A java based bangla learning tool for programming inspired from Scratch . </> java JavaFX GitHub Repo KichuPariNa ChatBot A CHATBOT USING CLOUD API
